name: Radication
description:
Grow as deep as you can!

Place tiles to continue your system of roots, but be careful what kind of soil you extend into. Different types of soil will have different effects. Don't run out of tiles, or valid places to place them or it's game over!

Use the left mouse button to drag tiles, and click the green tick to confirm.

Use the middle mouse button to look around, and the mouse wheel to zoom in or out.

  • Gameplay coded in Godot
  • Art drawn with Paint.net
  • Music created using GarageBand
  • Sound effects generated through sfxr
  • Text displayed using the fonts Carolingia and Linux Libertine

Created for Ludum Dare 48 (theme: "Deeper and deeper")

Mac and Linux builds are completely untested.
